title: KCTV5 News – Kansas City
description:
KCTV5.com is now with you on the go! Get the latest news updates and video, StormTrack 5 weather forecast, weather radar, special investigative reports, sports headlines and much more from KCTV5 News.
Features:
- Get the latest news and video from around the Kansas City area
- Get the current weather conditions and the StormTrack 5 forecast from Kansas City's most accurate weather team
- Watch our entire StormTrack 5 Forecast right on your phone or tablet
- Be informed with the latest stories from the KCTV5 News Investigators
- Get the latest sports headlines from on the Chiefs, Royals, Jayhawks, Tigers and Wildcats from the KCTV5 News Locker Room
- Watch the stories you will see Only on 5, like Good Question, Top 5, Friday Night Flights and Call For Action Download it for free!
